name: Sezza 8bit Theme
description:
Felt inspired while watching the 8bit Theme Week showcase onSezza's stream and put this together. Tis more of a slideshow than a game, but you do need to press Z on the keyboard or A on Game Boy sometimes haha.

Not all the images worked though. I need to mess around with the contrast for a couple and some were too busy for the engine. Can usually fix that by making the image a lil smaller though. Will try and fix those issues between workin' on my late entry into the theme haha.

Anyway, hope ye enjoy and great stuff y'all.
